text: Jason Jonathan Roy (born 21 July 1990) is a cricketer from England. He plays for England cricket team in One Day International (ODI) and Twenty20 International (T20I) cricket. He was born on July 21, 1990.Jason Roy == References == == Other websites == Category:1990 births Category:Living people Category:English and Welsh cricketers Category:Cricketers from Durban
title: Jason Roy
